artist: Artist: Utagawa Kuniteru II; Publisher: Arai Sannosuke
description: three sheets making continuous image; blue-roofed building at ULQ, with weathervane and bells on top; people in park on hotel grounds; wall with hexagonal blocks separating park from water, filled with boats from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
markings: Right sheet: Publisher\'s seal: 新井. Left sheet: 差配所蔵板; Publisher\'s seal: 新井
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: View of the Seaside Garden of the Hotel at Tsukiji in the Eastern Capital
